shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the audio subscribing state changes.

p.codeblock: public void onAudioSubscribeStateChanged(String channel, int uid, STREAM_SUBSCRIBE_STATE oldState, STREAM_SUBSCRIBE_STATE newState, int elapseSinceLastState) {}

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.
